info.name: Sample Collection for VMware Sample Exchange

item.name: Retrieve a list of Edges belonging to an Enterprise
Append a QOS/Biz Policy rule to a Profile

body.raw:
{
    "id": {{qosModuleId}},
    "enterpriseId": {{enterpriseId}},
    "_update": {
        "data": {
            "serviceRateLimit": {
                "enabled": false,
                "inputType": "percent",
                "value": 1
            },
            "cosMapping": {
                "lsInputType": "weight",
                "realtime": {
                    "high": {
                        "value": 35,
                        "ratelimit": false
                    },
                    "normal": {
                        "value": 15,
                        "ratelimit": false
                    },
                    "low": {
                        "value": 1,
                        "ratelimit": false
                    }
                },
                "transactional": {
                    "high": {
                        "value": 20,
                        "ratelimit": false
                    },
                    "normal": {
                        "value": 7,
                        "ratelimit": false
                    },
                    "low": {
                        "value": 1,
                        "ratelimit": false
                    }
                },
                "bulk": {
                    "high": {
                        "value": 15,
                        "ratelimit": false
                    },
                    "normal": {
                        "value": 5,
                        "ratelimit": false
                    },
                    "low": {
                        "value": 1,
                        "ratelimit": false
                    }
                }
            },
            "rules": [
                {
                    "name": "Box",
                    "match": {
                        "classid": -1,
                        "sip": "any",
                        "proto": -1,
                        "dport_high": -1,
                        "dport_low": -1,
                        "hostname": "",
                        "sport_low": -1,
                        "svlan": -1,
                        "dscp": -1,
                        "ssm": "any",
                        "os_version": -1,
                        "dsm": "any",
                        "appid": 767,
                        "sport_high": -1,
                        "dip": "any",
                        "dvlan": -1
                    },
                    "action": {
                        "edge2CloudRouteAction": {
                            "interface": "auto",
                            "linkInternalLogicalId": "auto",
                            "linkPolicy": "auto",
                            "routeCfg": {},
                            "routePolicy": "gateway",
                            "serviceGroup": "ALL",
                            "vlanId": -1,
                            "wanlink": "auto"
                        },
                        "edge2DataCenterRouteAction": {
                            "interface": "auto",
                            "linkInternalLogicalId": "auto",
                            "linkPolicy": "auto",
                            "routeCfg": {},
                            "routePolicy": "gateway",
                            "serviceGroup": "ALL",
                            "vlanId": -1,
                            "wanlink": "auto"
                        },
                        "QoS": {
                            "txScheduler": {
                                "latency": -1,
                                "burst": -1,
                                "queueLen": -1,
                                "priority": "high",
                                "bandwidthCapPct": -1,
                                "bandwidth": -1
                            },
                            "type": "bulk",
                            "rxScheduler": {
                                "latency": -1,
                                "burst": -1,
                                "queueLen": -1,
                                "priority": "high",
                                "bandwidthCapPct": -1,
                                "bandwidth": -1
                            }
                        },
                        "edge2EdgeRouteAction": {
                            "interface": "auto",
                            "linkInternalLogicalId": "auto",
                            "linkPolicy": "auto",
                            "routeCfg": {},
                            "routePolicy": "gateway",
                            "serviceGroup": "ALL",
                            "vlanId": -1,
                            "wanlink": "auto"
                        },
                        "routeType": "edge2Any"
                    }
                },
                {
                    "name": "Speedtest",
                    "match": {
                        "appid": 1465,
                        "classid": -1,
                        "dip": "any",
                        "dsm": "any",
                        "proto": -1,
                        "sip": "any",
                        "ssm": "any",
                        "os_version": -1,

item.name: Retrieve link metrics for a particular Edge
